name: Medieval Juice
description:
Summary

Medieval Juice is a chill, juicy, medieval-themed strategic building game that is initially created during the Kenney Jam 2022 in a few hours and is currently in development.

At its current phase, it is more than an interactive application when clicks spawn buildings, rather than a game. I plan to add procedural maps, deck-building and roguelite elements, and a point system where each placed building yield points based on its neighbors.

Controls

Place, Rotate Building: Left Mouse Button

Restart: R Key, Spacebar

Credits Authors

Ata Deniz Oktay - Game Design & Programming
